decisions.description: if no package is found, the user must add one in this flow. If a package is found, the user can decide to only update the pricelist
decisions.name: Package_found
decisions.label: Package found?

decisions.description: Does the current Price Book matches the new brand? Was a Price Book update Requested?
decisions.name: Price_Book_Update_Needed
decisions.label: Price Book Update Needed?

decisions.description: A Package update is needed if the new Brand does not match the Package Brand or if the user indicated the Package needed to be updated
decisions.name: Product_Package_update_Needed
decisions.label: Product Package update Needed?

Flow.description: flow to add or update a package and/or price book to an opportunity
Flow.interviewLabel: Screen Flow - Change Opportunity Package / Price Book {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Screen Flow - Change Opportunity Package / Price Book

recordCreates.description: Add a new opportunity package to the opportunity
recordCreates.name: Create_Opportunity_Package
recordCreates.label: Create Opportunity Package

recordDeletes.description: to be able to update the pricebook and package
recordDeletes.name: Delete_Existing_Opportunity_products2
recordDeletes.label: Delete Existing Opportunity products

recordLookups.description: Get the opportunity from which the flow started
recordLookups.name: Get_Opportunity
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunity

recordLookups.description: Get the opportunity package currently linked to this opportunity
recordLookups.name: Get_Opportunity_Package
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunity Package

recordLookups.description: Get the Pricebook that is now linked to the opportunity
recordLookups.name: Get_Opportunity_Price_Book
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunity Price Book

recordLookups.description: Opportunity Products linked to the opportunity, ready to be deleted
recordLookups.name: Get_Opportunity_Products
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunity Products

recordLookups.description: Get the package which was originally used on the opportunity
recordLookups.name: Get_Product_Package
recordLookups.label: Get Product Package

recordLookups.description: Opportunity Products linked to the opportunity, ready to be deleted
recordLookups.name: of_Get_Opportunity_Products2
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunity Products

recordLookups.description: Get the Package-Price books linked to this Package
recordLookups.name: X2_Get_Package_Price_Book
recordLookups.label: Get Package Price Book

recordLookups.description: Get the Package-Price books linked to this Package
recordLookups.name: X4_Get_Package_Price_Book
recordLookups.label: Get Package Price Book

recordUpdates.name: Update_Opportunity_to_sent_to_Odoo
recordUpdates.label: Update Opportunity to sent to Odoo

fields.name: NoChangeNeeded
fields.fieldText:
There seems to be no change needed for this opportunity.

Go back to change your choices or click 'Finish' to close this flow.

screens.description: Show pricelist, package and brand currently used
screens.name: Show_Opportunity_Information_with_Package
screens.label: Show Opportunity Information with Package

fields.name: IntroText1
fields.fieldText:
You are updating the Product Package and/or Price Book of this Opportunity.


These are the current values.

fields.name: IndicateNeededchanges
fields.fieldText: What to you want to change on this opportunity?

fields.name: ExtraInfo1
fields.fieldText:
Remark: if you choose to update the Product Package, you also be asked to indicate the Price Book (as it needs to be linked to the package)

Remark: if you choose to update the Brand, you might also need to update the Price Book and Product Package as they need to be available for the brand.

screens.description: Show pricelist and brand currently used
screens.name: Show_Opportunity_Information_without_Package
screens.label: Show Opportunity Information without Package

fields.name: IntroText2
fields.fieldText:
You are adding a Product Package to this Opportunity.


Before doing this, please check if the Brand for this opportunity is correct. This Opportunity currently has the following Brand linked: {!Get_Opportunity.Brand_Interest__c}

fields.name: Do_You_want_to_change_the_Brand
fields.fieldText: Do You want to change the Brand?

fields.name: X1_ChoosePackage
fields.fieldText: Please choose a Package from the list below:

fields.fieldText: Please choose a Price Book from the list below:
